Text: Outstanding program. Many thanks to the uploader. I thought I lost everything to a virus but this program helped me to save nearly everything. It takes a very long time to do its thing but it really does work.

Thank You so much !! With it I was able to save my external hard drive that I had been using for storing family pics and importnat docs. SAVED ME FROM A NIGHTMARE as I would have lost all kids pics :(

Will keep seeding so that it helps others as well.

This software is perfectly working and free from virus.... It just contains two files, setup file and crack file.. run the setup, and copy the crack file to the installed folder...I scanned the file with both kapersky and AVG, its clean....

Hi, this program worked great the first day (I was able to get my pictures from my corrupted hard drive); it was simple to use and clean of viruses.

However when I tried opening it up today a window would flash on screen for half a second and then disappear - the program would not work. Reinstalling wouldn't work and neither would redownloading. Many thanks to the uploader but please look into this matter if possible! :)
